item.title: How to Tweet Azure Pipeline activity easily
item.description: A while back I created a service linked to Twitter that tweets when your pipeline has completed in Azure Pipelines. This post is going to show you how you can easily tweet when your builds complete .
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
